double\_precision
&
{Determines whether double precision arithmetic is used.}
&
Bool
&
true
\\

use\_gpus
&
{Use GPU devices if available.}
&
Bool
&
true
\\
\hline

cuda\_device\_ids
&
{A comma-separated string containing device (GPU) IDs to use on a multi-GPU system, or `all' to use all devices.}
&
CSV integer list or `all'
&
all
\\
\hline

num\_devices
&
{Number of compute devices to use for the simulation. A compute device is either a local CPU core, or a GPU. Don't set this to more than the number of CPU cores in your system.}
&
{Integer $\geq$ 0, or `auto'}
&
auto
\\
\hline

max\_sources\_per\_chunk
&
{Maximum number of sources or pixels processed concurrently on a single compute device. Reduce if simulations run out of GPU memory.}
&
Integer > 0
&
16384
\\
\hline

keep\_log\_file
&
{Determines whether a log file of the run will remain on disk. Note that even if this option is set to false, logs will be stored in any visibility data files produced by the simulator.}
&
Bool
&
false
\\
\hline

write\_status\_to\_log\_file
&
{If set, write status (progress) messages to the log file.}
&
Bool
&
false
\\
